post.body: am i one of them? barca game looks v tasty, but it's man u game for me, jose back at old trafford. reckon he'll bring wine??
get there before me, why don't you. at least my list was comprehensive. you eurosceptic!
@chriscutmore7 Bell will get to 15, having shown his intent. Of late: not good enuff, but could answer his critics..
couldn't agree more, not sure what more shah's got to do. Broad for Anderson would've been my choice.
we're actually talking about boxing and rugby now Nicole. not as good as team balance though!
No mate, you're just as predictable as Jamie Noon never passing to the open winger and losing the ball in contact.
i riposte with Hatton v Pacquiao being bigger than Pac v Mayweather, really?? Only cos of the purse.
excellent photography, you really captured the terror, and the hole. :)
why would anyone do that? idiot. you'd go for Matt Tait if you had to go for anyone surely??
i will memorise that phrase for next term!
@chriscutmore7 don't think so: it's not stopping ppl coming over to work, jst getting in the 1st team. does that make sense?
or you could quickly change the name on a splash, and fight fire with fire...?
it's pretty much creative writing. My fav was this in the summer, 4th one down, just amazing http://tinyurl.com/3ro3qc
loving a bit of this tho, they just can't help themselves, it's incredible http://tinyurl.com/4ehy3o
haven't started yet, so i guess i'll get a move on then! how're you getting anyway buddy?
just been told to get into broadcast or anything else, because 'there's no future in the papers'. delightful...
pool v real, utd v inter, arse v roma, chel v juve, lyon v barca, sporting v munich, villareal v pana, atletico v porto, just come up
I concede my point, Anderson's been our best bowler today, top figures http://tinyurl.com/4ck4z5
Fury on our desk as a sub has given himself a joint byline on Reporter X's painstakingly put together article...just for subbing it!
cannot wait to finally take a break for xmas after today! still enjoying it though. odd mix...
I just joined the ukstudentjournos Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/ukstudentjournos and you can too. Please Retweet.
can anyone tell me when J and S coursework is due again? would be much appreciated. have brilliant new year's!
now feeling nervous about cooking xmas lunch for 12 tomorrow. why did i volunteer?? i guess i panicked.
at columbia road flower market earlier, absolutely manic, so many xmas trees. tried an oyster though, pretty good.
